text:
You studied English at school, you’re pretty 
good at reading and writing. But when it comes

to English conversation, or having a meeting on 
Zoom in English, you’re less comfortable. You need

an English-speaking course. You need English 
speaking practice. And you need feedback and

guidance from a trained teacher who can help you 
figure out what will help you sound more natural

in English conversation. I Rachel from Rachel’s 
English and that’s all we do. We help people like

you become confident speakers. Learn English 
for speaking. Not just reading and writing.

Be able to understand colleagues on the phone or 
in a meeting, online, feel confident that they’ll

be able to understand you. I have a student Meggy 
from France who says sometimes people mistake her

for a native speaker. I believe it! She sounds 
so natural and confident speaking English.

We have in my opinion, the very best course 
to transform your English speaking voice.

Develop your American voice, be 
confident, be heard. This spring,

starting today for five days only, I’m offering 
a coupon: SPRINGSALE to get your first month

in my academy for just $5. Access to all my 
English-speaking courses. Join Meggy and my other

students. The academy has over a dozen English 
speaking courses. Learn English at your own pace!

They’re all set up for you to study when you 
have time. I’ve developed the best method and

the best materials all you need to do is show up 
at your time and voila! Ease of speaking. Don’t

take this course if you don’t have any time 
to study. This is not just about learning;

it’s about changing speaking habits. To change 
habits, you have to do  things over and over

so your body does things naturally without having 
to think and it does take time. You’re using your

mind to train your body to change your habits in 
my academy. Listen to what my student Sophie said.

It’s like, it’s like learning how to swim. 
You know before this academy I only learned

the theories. You know how to move arms, how to 
move your legs but I never dive into the water.

But since I started to study in this academy, 
I feel like my body is learning you know.

I’m learning in the water; I’m actually doing 
it. And I love that aspect. I think the results

is quite quick. You know my family, friends 
already saw some difference and I’m really glad.

So dive in, move your body, 
build a habit. You can’t change

your English-speaking habit just 
by learning about it. You have to

involve regular training too. Let me show you 
the kind of training you’ll get in the academy.

In the academy, you’ll get access to over 15 
courses and literally over 300 videos. These are

videos you can’t get anywhere else. Many of these 
videos are Ben Franklin speech analysis videos.

We will take some conversation and do a full 
in-depth analysis. Each of these videos comes

with a vocabulary idioms and phrasal verbs 
lesson. But we don’t stop there. There’s also

audio soundboards to train with. Think of this 
as your gym. Just like a musician or an athlete,

we train repetitiously, that’s what you do 
here in the academy to change your habit.
Had you met her before?

I have a specific method that my students 
use to work with the sound boards and I’ve

seen it happen over and over. They get better 
using this method without any feedback from me.

They’re in the academy doing it, practicing, 
training and it transforms their accent.

Right now, you could be doing training 
rather than watching a video about training.

This is your moment and this moment won’t happen 
again. Remember, be sure to use the coupon code:

SPRINGSALE to get your discount. Your first 
month for just $5. The sale ends in 5 days.

Access to the academy is by subscription so note 
you will be charged every month but you can cancel

at any time. We do offer a 30-day money back 
guarantee so if you feel like this is not the

best English-speaking course for you, no problem! 
Just let us know within 30 days and we’ll cancel

and refund your charge. The thing that makes this 
course truly special is the students. We have a

really supportive online community of private group 
on Facebook but also a separate platform if you

don’t use Facebook where you can post a practice 
video and get feedback from a trained teacher.

You also get to know other students here. I love 
the positivity my students bring to learning.

One of my students, Martine 
recently made this comment

in our Facebook group. It feels like family and 
it’s the best place to learn. This place is a gem!

And the students support is also awesome! We 
clearly don’t know each other in real life but

sometimes it feels like we do 
though and push each other better.

Thank you Martine! You’re an 
important part of that family!

I want you to meet a few 
other students. This is Al.

I can see my improvements and now I can feel 
so confident in my English and I really,

really want you to also feel what 
I feel when you speak in English.

This is another student, Kostas who 
I got to work with one on one in one

of the live classes. I do live classes 
and work with a few students each month.

Hi guys! How are you? My name is Kostas and I’m 
here at work and I hope my boss won’t see me.

I just really wanted to share with you my 
experience with Rachel’s English Academy. Yes

that’s the reason and uhm, I’m super excited 
but usually I’m not doing things like that.

I’m quite shy but I really want to share with 
you because I really think it’s worth it. And

I really think, it really helped me. And I hope 
it will help you too if you do the right choice.

This is Ella. She joined because she understood 
that she needed to change her mindset about

learning and use imitation and repetition. Not 
just analysis and learning concepts. I love that!
I feel it’s really worth it. It’s worth it. Uhm,

So things I love most about 
this academy is first the thing:

It doesn’t only teach you the 
techniques, the traditional techniques

and about pronunciation improvement like vowel 
consonant, diphthong, rhythm etcetera. It also

changed my mindset because uhm, as someone who 
learns to approach new knowledge with logic

and analysis, I didn’t realize that 
imitation is actually the key to

learn pronunciation. Imitation is just 
so much more important than I thought.

So join me, Meggy, Sophie, Martine, Al, Kostas, 
Ella and all our wonderful teachers and students

in this truly unique experience. We’ve 
had thousands of students with hundreds

of different language backgrounds in 
the academy. Everyone can excel here.

Let’s do this together. If you want to see more 
from my students talking about their experience

in the academy, click on this video. If you’re 
thinking: I’m convinced, sign me up! let’s do

this! I’m ready! Then follow the link in the 
video description and use the code: SPRINGSALE

and check out Rachelsenglishacademy.com. 
I can’t wait to have you as a student.

That’s it and thanks so much 
for using Rachel’s English.
